channel.description: Recent content in Tags/VR on Science And Technology Council

item.title: CREATING VIRTUAL REALITY WORLD USING BLENDER
item.description: The primary objective of this project is to create a 3D virtual environment using an open source software Blender. The main motive is to make one comfortable in using the blender to create various projects and get known to its various applications.
